remarks: A positive integer is irreducible over ` ZZ ` iff it is a prime number. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Dec-2014.)  Obsolete version of ~ prmirredlem as of 10-Jun-2019.  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
prmirredOLD.1 $e |- Z = ( CCfld |`s ZZ ) $.
prmirredOLD.2 $e |- I = ( Irred ` Z ) $.
prmirredlemOLD $p |- ( A e. NN -> ( A e. I <-> A e. Prime ) ) $.
